pages.text: Luna stepped into the quiet garden just after sunrise.
Dew glittered on the leaves like tiny glass beads.
A sparrow hopped along the path, chirping a bright hello.
Luna followed the sound of water to a small stone fountain.
She dropped a pebble in and watched the ripples dance.
A gentle breeze carried the sweet scent of roses.
Butterflies floated by, painting the air with color.
In the shade, a curious cat blinked and stretched.
Luna sat on a bench and listened to the garden hum.
She traced the clouds as they drifted above the trees.
The sun climbed higher, warming her hands.
With a smile, Luna promised to visit again tomorrow.
